files.purpose: Draft Creator.gs Version: 01/28-12:30AM EST by Claude Opus 4.5 PURPOSE

functions.name: v2_searchAndLinkEmail_
functions.description: Search Gmail for existing emails/drafts and link in column B

functions.name: v2_createCustomerDraft_
functions.description: Create customer follow-up draft when "Email customer" is selected

functions.name: v2_createHandoffDraft_
functions.description: Create customer handoff draft when "Cust Handoff" is selected

functions.name: v2_createCustomerInfoDraft_
functions.description: Create customer info request draft when "Customer Info" is selected

functions.name: v2_createCOIDraft_
functions.description: Create COI request draft when "COI Req" is selected

functions.name: v2_createRoughQuote_
functions.description: Create rough quote draft/message when "Rough quote" is selected

functions.name: v2_exportRecoverRangeAsHtml_
functions.description: @param {Spreadsheet} ss - The spreadsheet object @param {string} rangeOverride - Optional range to export (e.g., "A1:K14" or "M1:S30") @returns {string|null} HTML table string or null on failure

functions.name: v2_buildHtmlBody_
functions.description: Email body builders ================ */

functions.name: d_generateRouteMapUrl_
functions.description: Generate Google Maps Static API URL for route image with distance/time data Returns object: { mapUrl, distance, duration } or null on failure

functions.name: d_generateSimpleMapUrl_
functions.description: Fallback: Generate simple map URL with just markers (no route line)

functions.name: testMapsApiConnection
functions.description: Test function - run this to verify Maps API works

functions.name: d_generateSatelliteMapUrl_
functions.description: Generate Google Maps Static API satellite view URL for a location Returns the satellite image URL or null on failure

files.purpose: EMAIL READER AUTOMATION - UNIFIED LEAD INGESTION Version: 01/20-09:20AM EST by Claude Opus 4.1 FEATURES:

functions.name: er_buildCSV_
functions.description: Build a 29-column CSV string from extracted data Columns: A-AC (Date through Awning Type)

functions.name: er_diagnosticCheck
functions.description: DIAGNOSTIC FUNCTION - Quick check, no popup

functions.name: er_isRubyEmail_
functions.description: Determine if email is from Ruby

functions.name: er_processApprovedEmail_
functions.description: Process Liz's reply to Proposal Review emails Detects approval language and updates customer stage Version: 02/06-05:30PM EST by Claude Opus 4.5

functions.name: er_processQuoteSentEmail_
functions.description: Process sent quote emails - updates customer stage to "Quote sent" Detects when you send customer quote emails Version: 02/06-06:50PM EST by Claude Opus 4.5

functions.name: er_processEmail_
functions.description: Process a single email - writes CSV to column A Stage Automation will split it across columns

functions.name: er_extractWithPatterns_
functions.description: Extract data using pattern matching

functions.name: er_extractStructured_
functions.description: Extract data using structured key:value parsing

functions.name: er_log_
functions.description: Logging function

functions.name: er_installTrigger
functions.description: Install trigger - runs every 15 minutes for BOTH Ruby and "Add lead"

functions.name: er_removeTrigger
functions.description: Remove trigger

functions.name: er_processNewEmails
functions.description: MAIN: Process ALL pending emails (Ruby + Add lead) - runs automatically

functions.name: er_processAddLeadEmails
functions.description: Process only "Add lead" emails manually

functions.name: er_testProcessing
functions.description: Test processing - no popup, just runs and shows toast

functions.name: checkTriggerHealth_
functions.description: Check if all expected triggers are installed - runs daily Only sends email if something is WRONG

functions.name: installTriggerHealthCheck_
functions.description: Install the daily health check trigger (runs at 7 AM)

functions.name: removeTriggerHealthCheck_
functions.description: Remove the health check trigger

functions.name: testTriggerHealthCheck_
functions.description: Test the health check (runs immediately, will email if triggers missing)

files.purpose: FORMULA RESTORATION SYSTEM Version# 01/28-10:45AM by Claude Opus 4.5 PURPOSE:

functions.name: handleEditFormula_
functions.description: Main edit handler - detects when protected formulas are changed Called automatically on every edit via installable trigger

functions.name: fr_restoreScheduled_
functions.description: Scheduled restoration handler - runs after delay to restore formulas Called automatically by time-based trigger

functions.name: fr_restoreAllFormulasNow_
functions.description: Immediately restore all protected formulas across all sheets Use this to quickly reset all formulas without waiting for the 5-minute delay

functions.name: fr_viewProtectedFormulas_
functions.description: Display all protected formulas organized by sheet and category Useful for reviewing what formulas are being monitored

functions.name: fr_viewPendingRestorations_
functions.description: Check status of any pending formula restorations Shows which formulas are scheduled to be restored and when

functions.name: fr_deleteRestoreTrigger_
functions.description: Delete restoration trigger for specific cell (placeholder for future enhancement)

functions.name: fr_cleanupTriggers_
functions.description: Clean up restoration triggers when no more pending restorations exist

functions.name: fr_logOperation_
functions.description: Logging helper - writes to console log with timestamp

functions.name: installTriggerFormula_
functions.description: Install the formula protection edit trigger Call this from the menu after adding new formulas or on initial setup

functions.name: uninstallTriggerFormula_
functions.description: Remove the formula protection trigger Use this if you need to temporarily disable formula protection

files.purpose: Lead Follow up.gs Version: 1/16 9am EST by Claude Sonnet 4.5 PURPOSE
LEAN-TO & A-FRAME RUBY (Exact) — Drive File Export Version: 1/16 9am EST by Claude Sonnet 4.5 Triggers on edits to Leads!T:AD (cols 20–30) when AA contains:

functions.name: r_buildRubyFromLeanToTemplate_
functions.description: Replace ONLY the parameter literals in the Lean-to Ruby template. Every other character (including spacing and comments) is preserved verbatim.

functions.name: r_buildRubyFromAFrameTemplate_
functions.description: Replace ONLY the parameter literals in the A-Frame Ruby template. Every other character (including spacing and comments) is preserved verbatim.

functions.name: r_getLeanToRubyTemplate_
functions.description: LEAN-TO RUBY TEMPLATE — DO NOT CHANGE ANYTHING HERE. We substitute only the parameter values via r_buildRubyFromLeanToTemplate_().

functions.name: r_getAFrameRubyTemplate_
functions.description: A-FRAME RUBY TEMPLATE — DO NOT CHANGE ANYTHING HERE. We substitute only the parameter values via r_buildRubyFromAFrameTemplate_().

functions.name: handleEditLeanToRuby_
functions.description: Backward compatibility wrappers for old function names

functions.name: copyRubyForSelectedRow_
functions.description: Copy Ruby code for the selected row to clipboard via dialog Version# [12/29-10:45AM EST] by Claude Opus 4.1

files.purpose: Macro wrapper for Copy Ruby function Keyboard shortcut: Ctrl+Alt+Shift+1 (or assigned number)

functions.name: CopyRuby
functions.description: Macro wrapper for Copy Ruby function Keyboard shortcut: Ctrl+Alt+Shift+1 (or assigned number)

files.purpose: Menus.gs Version: 01/26-11:52AM EST by Claude Opus 4.1 CHANGES:

functions.name: masterOnEditHandler_
functions.description: MASTER onEdit trigger handler This is the ONLY onEdit trigger that should be installed. It safely routes to all sub-handlers with error protection.

functions.name: logTriggerError_
functions.description: Log trigger errors to a hidden sheet for diagnosis

functions.name: installMasterTrigger_
functions.description: Install the MASTER onEdit trigger (replaces all individual triggers) This is the RECOMMENDED way to set up triggers

functions.name: checkTriggerHealthMenu_
functions.description: Check trigger health and report status

functions.name: autoRepairTriggers_
functions.description: Auto-repair triggers if master trigger is missing Can be run manually or scheduled

functions.name: installDailyTriggerRepair_
functions.description: Install a daily trigger health check (runs at 5 AM)

functions.name: viewTriggerErrorLog_
functions.description: View the error log sheet

functions.name: clearTriggerErrorLog_
functions.description: Clear the error log

functions.name: goToRecoverCalculations_
functions.description: Navigate to Re-cover sheet with the selected customer populated in K2 Works from Leads, F/U, or Awarded sheets

functions.name: showQuickBooksSetup_
functions.description: Show QuickBooks setup instructions

functions.name: listAllTriggers_
functions.description: System utility: List all triggers

functions.name: removeAllTriggers_
functions.description: System utility: Remove all triggers

files.purpose: Miles Log Version 8.1 [09/10-11:00AM EST] by Claude Opus 4.1 Features:
QBO ESTIMATES - QuickBooks Online Integration Version: 1/16 9am EST by Claude Sonnet 4.5 by Claude Opus 4.1

functions.name: convertEstimateToInvoice
functions.description: Convert estimate to invoice for awarded jobs Run this from Awarded sheet with active cell on the row to convert

functions.name: sendEstimateCurrentRow_
functions.description: Send estimate for current row in Leads sheet to QuickBooks Shows approval dialog with customer info before creating

functions.name: findOrCreateCustomer_
functions.description: Helper: Find existing customer or create new one in QuickBooks

functions.name: parseAddress_
functions.description: Helper: Parse address string into QuickBooks address object

functions.name: configureEnvironment
functions.description: Configure QuickBooks environment (production vs sandbox)

functions.name: listQuickBooksItems
functions.description: Debug: List all QuickBooks items (for line item configuration)

files.purpose: QUICKBOOKS AUTH (OAuth2 setup) Version: 1/16 9am EST by Claude Sonnet 4.5 by Claude Opus 4.1

functions.name: getScriptUrl
functions.description: Get the current web app URL - MUST run this after deploying as web app

functions.name: getOAuthService
functions.description: Initialize OAuth2 service for QuickBooks

functions.name: resetAuth
functions.description: Clear stored authentication credentials

functions.name: authorize
functions.description: Triggered from menu → "Authorize QuickBooks" Opens authorization in a modal with a clickable link

functions.name: authCallback
functions.description: OAuth2 callback handler

functions.name: doGet
functions.description: Web app entry point - MUST be deployed as web app

functions.name: testQuickBooksConnection_
functions.description: Test QuickBooks connection

functions.name: showRedirectUri_
functions.description: Helper function to show current redirect URI and setup instructions

functions.description: Check empty folders immediately (manual trigger from menu)

functions.description: Install daily folder check trigger (7am)
